core:endProcessAction.core:comment: Process is complete, basket balance is zero.

core:outcomeLink.core:comment: TODO Suspend from tendering if done at Card Voice Referral prompt would need to be handled specially.

core:endProcessAction.core:comment: Represents a choice of return to sales or a failure of this process

core:outcomeLink.core:comment: If single split, force print part receipt.

core:executeProcessAction.core:comment: We have completely split bill tendering but the basket balance is not zero. If there are still unpaid splits, force the user back to the start again. Otherwise go to normal tendering to complete.

core:action.core:comment: Create the print document from the template using any supplied input data.

core:assignAction.core:comment: We can use the size of the bill splits collection for number of customers.

core:outcomeLink.core:comment: Prompt to print part receipt if not the last split
Force a partial receipt to be printed if a card tender was used but the voucher was not printed.

core:state.core:comment: State only exists so that we can re-enter the TenderSplit state

core:eventLink.core:comment: If we are tendering a single split, end now.

core:state.core:comment: State only exists so that we can re-enter the TenderSplit state
